summary: Rid Tamriel From These Horrible Mutants
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim Apocolypse - Animal Edition v 0.6

Video - [youtube]G22a0719AUA[/youtube] (Thanks to godforgears)

Introduction
----------------------
An we thought the dragons were the worst the gods could through at us, they cursed Tamriel with a new plague, one that turns our livestock into mutants, 
savage beasts. We believe that after the dragons parished their spirits were sent back up to the gods. We don\'t believe in this \"Dragonborn\" nonsence.
If he wants to prove himself he will rid these demons from our lands once and for all!

Information
----------------------
This mod adds 8 New Bosses To The Game They Can Be Found In The Location Below, Your Goal Is To Rid Them From Tamriel, I Currently Do Not Know How To Turn That Goal Into A Quest Because I Am Currently Learning How To Use Creation Kit, This Mod Is Not Fully Finished Yet But I Am Hoping To Have A Mutant In Every City And This Mod Completed Before The End Of March


Animals/Mutants
----------------------
Serpion - Whiterun
Marth - Whiterun Ext.
Dante - Riverwood
Aldous - Helgen
Azizi - Riften
Calvin - Windhelm
Fieliki - Markarth
Percival - Solitude

Bugs
----------------------
If you see or experience any bugs when using this mod please return to the official mod page and report it.

Current Bugs

1. Fieliki Goes Flying Upon Death (Currently Being Worked On)

Installation
----------------------
Add The Files In The RaR Folder to your Skyrim Data Folder Located C:/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data


Follow Nix9862 For More Information On This And Upcoming Mods On Twitter Here: https://twitter.com/#!/Invisible_Cries
author: Nix9862
